goal.en: Train students for the knowledge and skills of basic chemical experiments
goal.ch: 培養化學系學生基本之化學實驗知識與操作能力

content.en:
“Experiments of Chemical Thermodynamics and Kinetics
Qualitative and Quantitative Analysis of Organic and Inorganic Compounds
Basic Synthesis Experiments for Organic and Inorganic Chemistry“
content.ch:
本課程將應用python、Excel等程式語言製圖，
“化學熱力學與動力學實驗
有機與無機化合物之定性與定量分析
基本有機與無機化學合成實驗“

textbook.en: “General Chemistry Experiments (edited by National Central University, Department of Chemistry)“
textbook.ch: 普通化學實驗(國立中央大學化學系編)

grading.ch: “實驗報告 40％ 實驗精神 30％ 考試成績 30％“

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
Test/Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
